Title: Day 6: 9:00 A.M. - 10:00 A.M.
Plot: Ray uses the component to bargain for his family?s freedom, but Ahmed only grants half his wish. Chloe moderates an argument between Morris and Milo, while Walid overhears information in the detention center that may be of use to CTU. Wayne agrees to pardon Assad in the face of his efforts to aid Jack; a gesture that does not sit well with an enraged Curtis. Jack follows a lead given to the police by Jillian, but his information comes too late to stop Fayed from launching another deadly strike.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Michael Angarano,  Ajay Mehta,  Shaun Majumder,  Steven Schub,  Raphael Sbarge,  Megan Gallagher,  Kal Penn,  David Michael,  Al Faris
